sect2.title: DummySender
sect2.para: This sender is intended to work as a dummy sender and to be used for testing scenarios and developing purposes. It does not actually send any message. It can simulate a synchronous waiting for a reply by setting the delay property.

row.entry: It is mandatory for all senders but it is irrelevant for the DummySender so it can be anything.
Time duration in milliseconds that the sender will simulate waiting for a response. If set to 0 (default) it will not wait at all.

simplesect.title: An example of DummySender configuration
simplesect.programlisting: <sender class="DummySender"> <property name="target" value="out there!"/> <property name="delay" value="500"/> </sender>
